long_description: Built to make biking easy, the 21-speed Diamondback Wildwood Deluxe Bike takes bumps out of the road with a shock-absorbent fork and seat post so you can hop on and have fun right from the start. Soft suspension fork helps eliminate jarring bumps and vibrations, and you can lock out the suspension to increase efficiency while pedaling. Aluminum Comfort Geometry frame offers a low standover height so it's easy to get on and off the bike. Saddle with soft foam over a dual-density base adds backside cushion while you're pedal-pushin', and shock-absorbent seat enhances comfort. Smooth Comfort tires feature light tread for reliable traction and durability on a wide variety of surfaces; double-tunnel alloy rims help prolong the life of the wheels. Shimano derailleurs, rear cogs and shifters work together to ensure precise, 21-speed gearing and an enjoyable ride. Closeout.
short_description: Built to make biking easy, the 21-speed Diamondback Wildwood Deluxe Bike takes bumps out of the road with a shock-absorbent fork and seat post so you can hop on and have fun right from the start.
